item.title: Getting started with flex
item.description: Installation or Setup (Apache Flex) # There are two ways to setup the Apache Flex SDK. You can use the provided Apache Flex SDK Installer, an Adobe AIR application that automates the process (on Windows or OS X/macOS). Or you can install it manually which obviously requires a greater comfort with your platform but provides more flexibility with the installation details. Installing Apache Flex SDK Using the Apache Flex Installer # Download the installer binary for your operating system (Window, Mac or Linux).
